name: Standard 2×2 crossover
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, half_life=8h, not NTI, no carryover risk, oral immediate-release
steps:
1. Input parameters into design selection system
2. System computes recommended design

name: Highly variable drug
preconditions: CV_intra=35%, half_life=6h, not NTI, no carryover risk
expected: Recommend full replicate design (e.g. 2×2×4) due to CV>30%

name: Narrow therapeutic index
expected: Recommend replicate design (2×2×4) for NTI scaling

name: Long half-life drug
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, half_life=72h, not NTI, no carryover risk
expected: Recommend parallel design (or 2×2 crossover with extended washout) due to long t½

name: Carryover risk present
expected: Recommend parallel design to avoid carryover

name: Ethical steady-state constraint
preconditions: Patient study, no washout possible (steady state)

name: Modified-release formulation
expected: Increase design robustness (likely 2×2 crossover but monitor variability) due to complex kinetics

name: High dropout risk
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, anticipated dropout high, standard conditions
expected: Consider parallel design to mitigate dropouts (avoids losing paired data)

name: Multiple formulations test
preconditions: Testing 3 formulations (T1, T2, R) under same condition
expected: Recommend parallel or nested design due to more than two treatments

name: Food effect study needed
expected: Recommend separate fed and fasting studies (2×2 each) or replicate if variability high

name: Edge: HVD with long t½
expected: Recommend replicate crossover with extended washout, or parallel if washout impractical:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

name: Partial replicate case
expected: Full replicate recommended instead of partial due to bias in 3-period design:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

name: Multiple period / sequence conflict
expected: Prefer simpler 2×2×4 design unless specific reason for more periods
